data.decision: Integrated devkit quality governance into MSJ project with Duro as AI visual QA provider
data.rationale: Creates feedback loop: .pen designs -> code -> devkit CI -> Duro verifier -> learn. Each deploy trains Duro to better detect design-code drift. Pattern extracted from cinematch devkit.config.json.
data.context: MSJ swimmer dashboard project with Next.js, Prisma, Pencil designs
